snippets: function sumTwoSmallestNumbers(numbers) {let holder_array = [];for(let i in numbers){if(holder_array.length<2){holder_array.push(numbers[i]);}else if(numbers[i] < holder_array[0] && holder_array[0]>holder_array[1]){holder_array[0] = numbers[i];  }  else if(numbers[i] < holder_array[1] && holder_array[1]>holder_array[0]){              holder_array[1] = numbers[i];             }            }         return(holder_array[0] + holder_array[1]);  }; sumTwoSmallestNumbers([1,10,80,40])

function spinWords(sentence){ let word_array = sentence.split(' '); function reverseOrder(word){ let reverse_word = ''; if(word.length>=5){ for(let i= word.length-1; i>=0; i--){ reverse_word += word[i]; } return reverse_word } else{ return word; } } return word_array.map(reverseOrder).join(' '); } spinWords('turn me inside out!')

function toCamelCase(str){ let words = str.split(/_|-/); function toIndividualWords(array_section){ let result = ''; if(array_section === words[0]){ result = array_section; } else{ result = array_section[0].toUpperCase() + array_section.slice(1); } return result; } return words.map(toIndividualWords).join(''); } toCamelCase('the string is now in camel case')

var countBits = function(n) { var binary_num = n.toString(2); var one_counter = 0; for(i=0; i< binary_num.length; i++){ if(binary_num[i] === '1'){ one_counter++; } } return one_counter; }; countBits(20020290)

function accum(s) { var accumulated = ''; var repeat_num = 0; var current_letter = ''; for(i=0; i<s.length; i++){ current_letter = s[i]; repeat_num = i+1; for(let n=0; n < repeat_num; n++){ if(n === 0){ accumulated += current_letter.toUpperCase(); } if(n === repeat_num -1 && i !== s.length-1){ accumulated += '-';} else if(n === repeat_num-1 && i === s.length-1){ break; } else{accumulated += current_letter.toLowerCase(); } } } return accumulated; } 
 				 accum('abcdeefs')

function XO(str='') { var x_count = 0; var o_count = 0; var result = true; for(i = 0; i<str.length; i++){ switch(str[i]){ case('x'): x_count++; break; case('X'): x_count++; break; case('o'): o_count++; break; case('O'): o_count++; break; } if(x_count === o_count){ result = true; } else{ result = false; } } return result; } 
				 XO('XOOX')
(function multiply(a, b){ let result = a * b; return result; })(10,72)
